body_html:
Trivial code change #6848 rejected as drpngx insists on Google's Contributor License Agreement to be signed and I don't have time to review it and the documents it refers to.

Anybody with CLA please take the 30 seconds to implement "temporarily add /sbin to PATH for ldconfig call" in your own way and contribute a patch (total time <5 minutes). (Don't copy my solution. Even though I would be ok with you copying it as I think it is trivial code, a Google bot may detect that it is identical or similar to a previously rejected pull request and reject it on these grounds.)

Anybody with CLA please take the 30 seconds to implement "temporarily add /sbin to PATH for ldconfig call" in your own way and contribute a patch (total time <5 minutes). (Don't copy my solution. Even though I would be ok with you copying it as I think it is trivial code, a Google bot may detect that it is identical or similar to a previously rejected pull request and reject it on these grounds.)
